competitors.name: AMD (Advanced Micro Devices)
competitors.notes: Main competitor with Zen microarchitecture; revenue surged 45% to $9.76B, profits up 630% in 2020

competitors.name: TSMC
competitors.notes: Top competitor in chipmaking; revenue increased 25.2% to $47.78B; controlled 54% of global foundry revenue in 2020

competitors.name: NVIDIA
competitors.notes: Leading GPU and AI computing solutions; acquired Mellanox Technologies in 2020

competitors.name: Samsung
competitors.notes: Controls ~5% of microprocessor market; 2020 revenue of $197.69B

competitors.name: Apple
competitors.notes: Began transition from Intel x86 to Apple Silicon for Mac computers in 2020

competitors.name: Qualcomm
competitors.notes: Known for mobile phone processors and wireless technologies

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Technology and consulting company competing in semiconductors

competitors.name: Oracle
competitors.notes: Competitor in enterprise technology and processors

context: Intel Corporation is a semiconductor company focused on CPUs for PCs and data centers, foundry services. Manufacturing delays. Apple dropped Intel for M1.
